content.p: An interdisciplinary, cross-faculty centre for innovative imaging in experimental and translational medicine, bringing together researchers who develop new medical imaging techniques with clinicians and scientists who use them. Our centre spans two sites: one based on University Park and the other in the Medical School, Queen's Medical Centre (QMC). Sir Peter Mansfield Imaging Centre, Building 18, University Park Campus Sir Peter Mansfield Imaging Centre, A109, A Floor, Medical School, Queen's Medical Centre Proposed national facility for 11.7T human MRI scanning This is the place that gave the world MRI Volunteer How to find us Join us on Facebook Follow us on Twitter See all our news articles There are no results that match your criteria.
